Posts.Content: Hi Ali.. Have been worried about u...so sorry things been horrible with u...sending loads hugs your way n hope ur getting there.  Hang in there pal Lol xxx

Posts.Content: Hi Ali.. Have been worried about u...so sorry things been horrible with u...sending loads hugs your way n hope ur getting there.  Hang in there pal Lol xxx
Posts.Title: Ali owl and fellow Thursday chemo clubbers

Posts.Content: Thank you Anastasia..When did u have ur lumpectomy?  I had to get mastectomy....Not because tumour was big...but because I am small!!! Will let u know how it goes tomorrow? Oh not looking forward to it...think a wee glass of vino might be on the cards when these staples are out haha .. Hugs and best wishes to you too. xx
Posts.Title: one week in!

Posts.Content: hi Ali pal...oh how i wish u were here...u will b when this is all over for the two of us...sunshine here pal...as son as ur fine ur oot here ...Thinking of u loads today...keep strong...big hugs and loadsa luv coming ur way...from me to u xxx
Posts.Title: one week in!

Posts.Content: 1 week ago today I had my mastectomy..can't believe how good I feel..yep I have had a couple of melt downs and looking at my scar was just soo hard, but not as bad as I thot it was gonna b...big melt down letting Jim (hubby) see it but he was so supportive n am so glad that s done n dusted now..next hurdle tomorrow..go back to hospital to get staples out.oooyaaa. staples ???? Not looking forward to that at all.
Posts.Title: one week in!

Posts.Content: As brilliant New Ali...go girl go...soo pleased for u. Sending big hugs lol xx
Posts.Title: picc line gone !!!!!!

Posts.Content: , Hi ladies..just looking for a bit of advice here.  I had a mastectomy a couple of weeks ago and sentinel lymph nodes taken for biopsy.  Scar is healing well but I do have swelling , seems to be where they took lymph nodes, it is warm to touch.  Loads of pain in arm but no swelling.  I have appointment to see oncologist on 20th to get biopsy results and discuss follow on treatment.  Not sure whether what is happening just now is normal or should I see doc before 20th.  Thanks xxx.
Posts.Title: Arm so sore and feels warm to touch where lymph nodes taken for b...

Posts.Content: thanks so much ladies (and George!) for the advice..am now making arrangements to see doc  .This fórum is a true blessing for me ...as i live in Tenerife  it is so good to have contact with yourselves .. The care here in Tenerife is excellent , no problem at all but it is nice to be able to get advice in my native language!!!  Regards Moira xxx
Posts.Title: Arm so sore and feels warm to touch where lymph nodes taken for b...

Posts.Content: Thanks Judith..will get it checked out asap...had a feeling it wasnt quite right.. Thanks so much for replying . regards Moira xx
